name: Kabaddi - Indian Sports Game
description:
Become super dexterous and really skillful player of kabaddi – famous Indian sports game! Compete with the other team trying to beat it up! Learn the rules and do everything possible not to let your crew down, ‘cause the victory is really important! Rush into our new interesting Kabaddi Game Indian Sports Simulator game and just enjoy it!

What’s kabaddi? Kabaddi is a contact team sport that originated in Tamilnadu! Do everything possible to win, your team relies on your exquisite skills! Become the greatest kabaddi player ever and you won’t be disappointed!

Two teams compete, each occupying its own half of the court. They take turns sending a "raider" into the opposing team's half and earn points if the raider manages to touch opposing team members and return to the home half, all while chanting word "kabaddi". However, if the raider is tackled and prevented from returning, the opposing team gets the point. Do everything possible to win this wonderful Kabaddi Game Indian Sports Simulator game!

Earn points for successfully won matches and unlock new interesting uniform for your kabaddi team! Be ready to have great contests in different locations and countries, show them all who’s the boss here and win the champion’s cup!

Kabaddi Game Indian Sports Simulator features:
• Unique opportunity to do unusual Indian sports game - kabaddi
• Win the party and unlock many interesting skins for your team
• Enjoy different match court locations
• Rush into the thrilling atmosphere made in 3D

Experience unusual Indian sports game – kabaddi! Become team player, whose aim is nothing but victory! Play Kabaddi Game Indian Sports Simulator and have fun! Power your skills up, become really fast and dexterous to win!
